title: Nuclear power plants : permanent shutdowns 2005 to 2019
summary: In general Number of shutdowns has fallen over the Year.
Number of shutdowns is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2010.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Number of shutdowns, about 3.0 was reported at Year 2009
The lowest Number of shutdowns, of value 1.0 was reported at Year 2010
